recipes.creditText: Can't Stay out of the Kitchen
recipes.sourceName: Can't Stay out of the Kitchen

extendedIngredients.name: heavy whipping cream
extendedIngredients.originalString: 5 tbsp. heavy whipping cream or half-and-half

extendedIngredients.name: unbleached flour
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 ½ cups UNBLEACHED all-purpose flour (bleached flour toughens baked goods)

recipes.title: Peach Bars with Almond Drizzle
recipes.instructions: CRUST:Stir flour, salt and sugar together.Add butter and cut in with a pastry blender until well blended.Reserve 1 cup crumbs.Pour remaining crumbs into a greased 9x13” baking dish and press down firmly.Bake at 350° for 15 minutes.Top with filling and bake an additional 50-60 minutes or until filling ingredients are set.Cool 15 minutes before adding almond drizzle. FILLING:Whisk eggs, flour, sugar, sour cream and salt together.Gently fold in peaches.Pour peach mixture over top of baked crust layer.Sprinkle filling layer with remaining cup of crumbs.Bake at 350° for 1 hour or until set.Cool 15 minutes before adding almond drizzle.ALMOND DRIZZLE:Combine ingredients with whisk.After bars have cooled 15 minutes, drizzle icing over top of Peach Bars with a fork.

steps.step: CRUST:Stir flour, salt and sugar together.
Add butter and cut in with a pastry blender until well blended.Reserve 1 cup crumbs.
Pour remaining crumbs into a greased 9x13” baking dish and press down firmly.
